metadata.title: CVE-2023-52657 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Revert "drm/amd/pm: resolve reboot exception for si oland"This reverts commit e490d60a2f76bff636c68ce4fe34c1b6c34bbd86.This causes hangs on SI when DC is enabled and errors on driverreboot and power off cycles.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
